item.title: Screen Watch Dog v1.11 Released
item.description: Screen Watch Dog App This little application will help you to monitor your screen while you are not looking at it. Here is how you can use it: 1. Move the main Application window to the screen you wish to monitor. 2. Press the button 'Select watch bounds'. 3. Press and hold the left mouse button. 4. Draw a rectangle across your area of interest. 5. Release the left mouse button.

item.title: About Screen Watch Dog
item.description: This little application will help you to monitor your screen while you are not looking at it. Here is how you can use it: 1. Move the main Application window to the screen you wish to monitor. 2. Press the button 'Select watch bounds'. 3. Press and hold the left mouse button. 4. Draw a rectangle across your area of interest. 5. Release the left mouse button. 6. Application will monitor changes that happened in the selected area.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: ScreenWatchDog doesn’t use data that you provide for any other reason than sending notifications about activity on the selected section of the screen. Image processing and comparsion is done on the fly inside Application running process. Nothing is shared or distributed outside Applciation.
